summary: A taped version of the stage play about a hideously deformed 19th-century London man and how he managed to triumph over his disease.
cast: Philip Anglim|Kevin Conway|Penny Fuller|Richard Clarke|Glenn Close|Jarlath Conroy|Rex Everhart|Christopher Hewett|William Hutt|Charlotte Moore|Josephine Nichols|David Rounds|Veronica Castang|William Duff-Griffin|Joe Grifasi|Myvanwy Jenn|John Neville-Andrews|Jean-Pierre Stewart|Bob Cowan
title: El hombre elefante
